active-color.description: The color of the title and tab selected
active-color.description_zh: 标题和选项卡选中的颜色

inactive-color.description: Colors that are unchecked for the title and tab
inactive-color.description_zh: 标题和选项卡未选中的颜色

close-on-click-mask.description: Click whether the mask closes the menu
close-on-click-mask.description_zh: 点击遮罩是否关闭菜单

close-on-click-self.description: Click on the title of the current active item to close the menu
close-on-click-self.description_zh: 点击当前激活项标题是否关闭菜单

duration.description: The transition time for the tab to expand and collapse, in ms
duration.description_zh: 选项卡展开和收起的过渡时间，单位ms

height.description: The height of the title menu is arbitrary, and the value is RPX by default
height.description_zh: 标题菜单的高度，单位任意，数值默认为rpx单位

border-bottom.description: Whether the title menu displays a lower border
border-bottom.description_zh: 标题菜单是否显示下边框

title-size.description: The font size of the title is arbitrary, and the value is rpx by default
title-size.description_zh: 标题的字体大小，单位任意，数值默认为rpx单位

border-radius.description: The rounded value below the menu expansion content, in arbitrary units
border-radius.description_zh: 菜单展开内容下方的圆角值，单位任意

menu-icon.description: icon to the right of the title menu

menu-icon-size.description: The size of the icon on the right side of the title menu is arbitrary, and the value is RPX by default
menu-icon-size.description_zh: 标题菜单右侧的图标的大小，单位任意，数值默认为rpx单位

events.name: open
events.description: Triggered when the drop-down menu is opened
events.description_zh: 下拉菜单被打开时触发
events.params: (index) - 当前被打开菜单的索引

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the drop-down menu is closed
events.description_zh: 下拉菜单被关闭时触发
events.params: (index) - 当前被关闭菜单的索引
